paragraphs: Proceedings of the IJCNLP-08 Workshop on NER for South and South East Asian Languages, pages 1–2, Hyderabad, India, January 2008. c⃝2008 Asian Federation of Natural Language Processing

sections.title: Named Entity Recognition: Different Approaches Sobha, L AU-KBC Research Centre MIT Campus of Anna University Chennai-44 sobha@au-kbc.org Abstract
paragraphs: The talk deals with different approaches used for Named Entity recognition and how they are used in developing a robust Named Entity Recognizer. The talk includes the development of tagset for NER and manual annotation of text. 1  2
